Sharing your story is shocking to hear, but I know there are so many more. Alcohol is becoming a problem for so many people. But still today a legal drug that people do not know the consequences of, on their physical and mental health. People also do not understand addiction and where it can take you. I hope this will help others to look at their own drinking. Thank you.
